title: Court issues Enjoining Order preventing CEB Engineers’ Trade Union action
body_lines: The Colombo District Court today issued an enjoining order preventing the Ceylon Electricity Board Engineers Union, its office bearers and its members from preventing supply of electricity to the general public as a result of engaging in any strike or trade union action.
Colombo District Court Judge Purnima Paranagamage made this order pursuant to a plaint filed by Ceylon Electricity Board.
The Colombo District Court issued notices on defendants including the office bearers of Ceylon Electricity Board Engineers Union returnable for 22nd of June 2022.
Romesh De Silva PC with Counsel Ruwantha Coorayl and Naamiq Nafath instructed by Sanath Wijewardane appeared for the Plaintiff.(Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
